Body:
"""
    Test of utils.comp_scalar() function
    """
name = 'Test arrays'
exceptions = {'Test arrays': 1e-06}
tol = 1e-05
comparison = utils.comp_scalar(name, a, b, tol, [], exceptions=exceptions,
    relative=relative)
assert comparison
pytest.mark.parametrize('a,b,relative', [(a, b, False), (a, b, True), (a0b0,
    a0b0, False)], ids=['not relative', 'relative', 'less than epsilon'])
